identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme.vibe: A digital playground. Soft, tactile, and full of wonder.

rules: Headings must be expressive and large (text-4xl+).
Use tight letter spacing (tracking-tight) for large headings.
Use loose line height (leading-relaxed) for body text.
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use rounded fonts to match the playful theme.
No generic full-screen gradients. Use texture (noise, grain) > gloss.
Use 'Deep Indigo' (#1E1B4B) for text instead of pure black.
Use 'Sunshine Yellow' (#FCD34D) for sparks and highlights.

spacing.philosophy: Generous spacing. Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.

grid_system.gallery: Bento Grid (Mode A: The Tetris Grid). Mix hero, square, and tall items.
grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid (Mode B). Dense, data-correlated.

rules: Optical Alignment: Center-align headings only if it improves hierarchy.
Negative Space: Value empty areas; they give breathing room.

buttons.interaction: Scale up slightly on hover (scale-105), active press down (scale-95).

cards.style: Soft rounded corners (rounded-2xl), subtle shadow (shadow-sm), white background.
cards.interaction: Tilt effect on hover, shadow deepens (shadow-md).

inputs.style: Large touch targets, soft borders, pastel background on focus.

upload_zone.style: Dashed border (border-dashed border-2), animated background pattern on hover.

textures: Grain/Noise overlay (opacity-50) to kill digital flatness.

motion.micro_interactions: Hover lifts, button presses, loading spinners.

3d_elements.usage: Subtle particle effects (TSParticles) or soft 3D blobs for 'processing' state.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
Implement the 'Magic Transform' pattern: One-tap transformation with visual before/after.
Do NOT use 'Inter' font. Import 'Fredoka' and 'Quicksand' from Google Fonts.
Create a 'design_system' folder in components to house reusable UI elements.
Ensure the upload interface feels like a 'magic portal' or 'frame'.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the gallery page.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
